charges.charge_description: 18:2113(a) and (d); BANK ROBBERY BY FORCE OR VIOLENCE; Armed Bank Robbery(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant sentenced to One Hundred and Twenty-One (121) Months to run concurrent with Counts 2 and 3 and consecutive to Count 4 followed by Sixty (60) Months of Supervised Release to run concurrent with Counts 2, 3 and 4; Special Assessment of $100.00 and Restitution of $83,120.00 imposed

charges.charge_description: 18:924(c)(1)(A); VIOLENT CRIME/DRUGS/MACHINE GUN; Using, Carrying or Possessing a Firearm During and in Relation to a Crime of Violence(4)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant sentenced to Eighty-Four (84) Months to run consecutive to Counts 1-3 followed by Supervised Release of Sixty (60) Months to run concurrent with Counts 1-3; Special Assessment of $100.00 and Restitution of $83,120.00 imposed
